pages.title: Draconic Evolution
pages.text: Draconic Evolution is a mod designed to make endgame more worthwhile. Emphasis on 'endgame' as this mod requires an extreme amount of work to achieve the benefits.$(br)It adds new powerful tools, machines, and items. The mod's content is based around its ore block, Draconium Ore. This mod uses Redstone Flux (RF) for its energy systems

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: The first thing you should do is consult $(l:https://ftb.gamepedia.com/Draconic_Evolution#Guides)The Wiki$(/l) for your first steps.$(br2)You were also given a tablet which opens an ingame guide, crafting recipe is above if you lose it.
